post.author: 이석준
post.content:
JOB OPPORTUNITY...CPPIB (CANADA PENSION PLAN)...JAVA/UI DEVELOPER...CONTRACT...2 MONTHS...45.00 - 55.00 INC...DOWNTOWN...
This Canadian based organization is one of the world's fastest growing institutional investment organizations. They currently have a need for a Java developer that has strong UI and Site Design skills. The initial term will be 2 months and this role is located in downtown Toronto.
Duties will include:
-Design, in consultation with members of the EPM team, the general look and feel of a web browser based interface to the EPM application platform, including
Big picture human factors decisions around screen layout and navigation
Standardized style sheets (etc.) as required to simplify the extension of applications on the platform
-Navigation and structure of the entire interface layer
-Build specific web page(s) to access, input and update qualitative and numerical data in the database and the document management system
-Build specific web page(s) to display quantitative analysis for individual funds
-Incorporate input / output links to underlying analytical business applications written in Matlab, and display the output of these applications in appropriate charted and tabular form
Provide the ability to export such output to a portable format (such as PDF)
Build specific web page(s) to display quantitative portfolio level analytics, analogous to individual fund analysis pages
The contractor must have excellent communication skills and an ability to recommend best practices related to UI Architecture (site layout, design)
Must have at least 3-5 years of hands-on experience of design and development of java based web interface design.
Excellent working knowledge of Seam, JSF, Ajax, Java scripts, XML, CSS, DHTML, HTML and JSON.
Deep understanding of connecting UI to Java classes, web services, EJB 3.0.
Detail-oriented with an ability to produce highly accurate work.
Ability to deliver in a high performance culture, operating under time-sensitive deadlines
Osama Nasser
Professional Recruiter
TEKsystems
150 York Street, Suite 1206, Toronto, ON, M5H 3S5
T 416.342.5013, F 416.342.5070
onasser@teksystems.ca
post.title: [Contract] JAVA/UI DEVELOPER
